commit.message:
gen-pass-instances.awk: Rename var where to call_starts_at in handle_line

2015-11-12  Tom de Vries  <tom@codesourcery.com>

	* gen-pass-instances.awk (handle_line): Rename var where to
	call_starts_at.

From-SVN: r230218
